actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend section 170 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to certain charitable contributions by members of the Civil Air Patrol.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals to deduct, as a charitable contribution, those expenses attributable to the operation, maintenance, and repair of vehicles used to provide gratuitous services to the Civil Air Patrol.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 170 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to certain charitable contributions by members of the Civil Air Patrol.
